name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AudioAI: Voice-to-Text for ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, v0.dev, LiGo, etc.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add voice input to AI chats and websites. Speak to type on ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, etc. More productivity, less typing strain.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
VoiceAI for ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, LiGo & v0.dev: Talk to AI, Type Anywhere. 

Tired of typing really long prompts, or messages? 
VoiceAI Chat Assistant lets you chat with AI using just your voice. It's perfect for long conversations with Claude, ChatGPT, Perplexity, and v0.dev. But it doesn't stop there - use it for comments, emails, or any text input across the web.

Why People Love VoiceAI

Save Time: Speak your ideas three times faster than typing.
Boost Creativity: Let your thoughts flow naturally through speech.
Reduce Strain: Give your fingers a break from constant typing.
Improve Accessibility: Interact hands-free with AI and websites.

How It Works

Install: Add VoiceAI to Chrome in seconds.
Speak: Click the mic icon and start talking.
Review: Quick edit if needed, then send or paste.

It's that simple. No more struggling with long typing sessions or losing your train of thought mid-sentence.

Features That Make a Difference

Works Everywhere: Use with Claude, ChatGPT, Perplexity, LiGo, v0.dev, and any website.
Fast and Accurate: State-of-the-art speech recognition gets it right.
Privacy First: Your voice data stays on your device.
Edit with Ease: Tweak the text before using it (because humans naturally don't focus on perfection when "speaking". 
Cross-Platform: Works on Windows, macOS, and Linux.

Free Tier: Powerful Features at No Cost

Generous Monthly Allowance: Plenty of minutes for regular users.
Full Feature Access: No stripped-down version here.
No Credit Card Required: Just install and go.

Premium Tier: For When You Need More
Only $5/month for:

Unlimited Voice Conversion: Talk as much as you want.
Priority Processing: Faster transcription during busy times.
Advanced Editing: Polish your text to perfection.
Priority Support: Get help when you need it.

Perfect For:

Students: Dictate essays and research notes effortlessly.
Professionals: Draft emails and reports on the go.
Developers: Describe coding issues to AI naturally.
Content Creators: Capture ideas the moment they strike.
Anyone with Typing Difficulties: Interact online with ease.

Your Privacy Matters

We don't store your voice or transcribed text (which means, there is no "chat history", etc.).
We're transparent about permissions.
The transcription happens, and then your data is "gone". It's not stored during processing either. 

Getting Started is Easy

Add VoiceAI Chat Assistant from the Chrome Web Store.
Click the extension icon and allow microphone access.
Start talking to AI or dictating anywhere on the web.

The Future is Voice
We're constantly improving. Coming soon:

More language support
Advanced voice commands
Integrations with more of your favorite tools

Ready to Talk Instead of Type?
Don't let slow typing hold back your brilliance. Whether you're crafting the next viral post, coding the future, or just chatting with AI, VoiceAI Chat Assistant is your shortcut to getting more done, faster.
Download now and start talking. Your fingers will thank you.
VoiceAI Chat Assistant: Where your voice becomes text, and your ideas come to life.

Tech Specs:
- Microphone-enabled device
- Internet connection

Note: While we strive for accuracy, factors like accent and background noise can affect results. Premium users get our best recognition tech.

Try VoiceAI Chat Assistant today. Let your voice do the typing!
